title: Honor screen from prior game  [CLIENT]
body:
After my last game the honor screen showed the players from the game before so I could not honor a team mate.

Steps
1: Skipped waiting for stats after game
2: End of next game honor screen was wrong

First time I have seen the bug, but also first time I have skipped stats since honor went live.

replies.body:
Hi Marioace, thanks for the feedback! We're looking into it but would love to get more information if you have any :) Like:
1. timestamp of when this happened
2. how long it was in between the affected games
3. if any LCU performance-related options were enabled (Close Client During Game, or Low Spec Mode Enabled)
4. any other info you have on these games (who was in it, etc)
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Sorry I didnt respond sooner, didnt notice message.

1. Dont have timestamp anymore. Just know that it occurred right before I posted this bug
2. Time between games was however long queue was. Under 5 minutes.
3. No performance related options enabled.
4. Dont have any other info that could help.
